function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High number of deaths in certain scenarios","Impact":"Increased cost of maintaining the healthcare system, higher public expenses","Mitigation":"Implement measures to reduce the number of deaths through effective public health interventions","Technologies":"Healthcare technology, data analysis for targeted interventions","People":"Citizens, healthcare system","Owner":"Government, healthcare authorities"},{"Description":"Economic damage to businesses in certain scenarios","Impact":"Financial loss, potential impact on employment and economic stability","Mitigation":"Implement measures to support businesses, provide financial aid, and create economic stimulus packages","Technologies":"Financial technology, economic forecasting tools","People":"Businesses, employees","Owner":"Government, financial institutions"},{"Description":"Challenges in underdeveloped countries in implementing lockdowns","Impact":"Limited ability to control disease spread, increased vulnerability to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Invest in public health infrastructure, develop community-based interventions, and provide international support","Technologies":"Mobile health clinics, telemedicine, remote monitoring systems","People":"Underdeveloped country populations","Owner":"Global health organizations, international aid agencies"}]}
